    obiwan.qa.plots_footprint¶

    Draw box around region of intertest, show where injected sources, color code sources by those with obiwa tractor catalogues

    Classes

    BricksQueued([bricks_list_fn, survey_bricks_fn]) plot ra,dec of bricks submitted to QDO queue
    CCDsUsed([ccds_used_wildcard])
    SummaryPlots(summary_fn, survey_bricks_fn[, …]) Plots heatmaps of the summary table quantities

    Functions

    cut_to_region(table, region) returns a copy of table cut to region
    footprint_outline(region) region that wish to inject simulated sources into
    radec_limits(region) region containing bricks that ran with obiwan
    radec_limits_tight(region)
    class obiwan.qa.plots_footprint.BricksQueued(bricks_list_fn=None, survey_bricks_fn=None)[source]¶

    plot ra,dec of bricks submitted to QDO queue

    Are we missing regions because didn’t submit all the bricks?
